name: Floor 33
description:
“The basis of all human fears, he thought. A closed door, slightly ajar.”: This Steven King quote sums up the feeling of looming dread that fills your body as you play Floor 33.

The story for now a miserable tale of a tragedy you caused that has quite literally come back to haunt you. Armed only with a flashlight and a list of things to do before you leave with a looming presence that something is not right. 

Experience true fear and a terror when pressing the play button!

Controls

F - Toggle Flashlight

Q - Toggle Clipboard

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Interact

Support

When downloading the game you will be prompted to leave a tip, although not necessary it is much appreciated *wink wink*.

Follow us on Instagram for updates!

Version

This is an early prototype of the game and bugs are to be expected. You've been warned!
